description.en: During the course, students will do various types of exercises to revise grammar and improve their vocabulary, as well as practise listening, writing and speaking. As part of the requirements, students will make a short presentation and discuss a text of their choice.
description.et: Kursuse käigus tehakse harjutusi grammatika kinnistamiseks ja sõnavara laiendamiseks, kuulamisülesandeid ja kirjalikke töid, arendatakse vestlusoskust ning loetakse tekste kesktasemel. Õpilased teevad lühiettekande neile tuttaval teemal ning loevad vabalt valitud lektüüri.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to develop reading, speaking, listening and writing skills as well as improve vocabulary and practise grammar at an intermediate level.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on arendada lugemis-, kõnelemis-, kuulamis- ja kirjutamisoskust, laiendada sõnavara ning harjutada grammatikat kesktasemel.

learning_outcomes.en: By the end of the course students will have improved their vocabulary range and knowledge of grammar, can understand and find essential information in intermediate texts, are able to speak on familiar everyday topics.
learning_outcomes.et: Kursuse edukalt lõpetanu on laiendanud sõnavara, oskab kasutada õpitud keelestruktuure, mõistab keskmise raskusastmega tekste ning oskab leida neist olulist informatsiooni, on võimeline kõnelema igapäevastel ja tuttavatel teemadel.

independent_work.et:
Iseseisva töö juhised antakse tunnis ja sisestatakse Moodle'isse.
For individual study instructions, please see Moodle.

grade_preconditions.et:
Osalemine õppetöös vähemalt 75% ulatuses. Participation in at least 75% of practical lessons.
Positiivne tulemus 2s kontrolltöös (61% õigeid vastuseid). Passing 2 tests with the minimum score of 61%.
Kodulektüüri vastamine (10 lk). Answering homereading (approximately 10 pages). 
Ettekande tegemine (10-12 min). Making a presentation (10-12 minutes).
Kirjalike kodutööde esitamine. Short written assignments to be handed in during the course.

grade_evaluation.et:
Arvestus saadakse siis, kui semestri jooksul on täidetud kõik hindamisele pääsemise tingimused.
Non-differentiated assessment.

resources.mandatory_materials:
1) Cutting Edge Intermediate. Third edition. Sarah Cunningham, Peter Moor and Jonathan Bygrave. Pearson Education Limited 2013. Units 7-12.
2) Materjalid Moodle'is. Üliõpilase ülesanne on tundi tulles kõik vajalikud materjalid kaasa võtta. Please see Moodle. The students are expected to take the required materials with them to class.

description.et:
Esialgne ajakava/Tentative course schedule

Class 1: Get to know the classmates. Course overview and requirements. 

Week 1 - Week 2
Unit 8 Social life: Grammar: Polite requests. 'Will' and 'shall' for instant responses. Vocabulary and speaking: Social behaviour, norms and customs.

Week 3
Adverbs and expressions of frequency. Good and bad manners phrases and quiz. Talking about norms and customs in different cultures.

Week 4
We start with presentations. 
Unit 7 Must see: The passive voice pp 68-69. Movie quiz. Extreme adjectives and adverbs p 71.
Practice of the passives: students' movie or culture quiz; dialogue between Oliver and Sophie. Practice of of weak and strong adjectives.

Week 5 - Week 6
Revision of strong adjectives and passives; Unit 7 making social arrangements p 75; reading reviews p 74.

Week 6 
Unit 9 Stuff!: Vocabulary revision p 87. Defining relative clauses p 88. Describing everyday objects p 91.
Defining relative clauses p 88; quantifiers p 90.

Week 7
Unit 9. Revision. 

Test 1

Week 8 - Week 9
Unit 10: Saying figures. Making predictions.Talking about change in society.
Hypothetical situations. Talking about social problems.

Week 10 - Week 11
Hypothetical situations. Balancing a budget. How to do the "homereading" task (see Moodle for guidelines).

Week 12 
Linking words practice. Talking about past rules (modals/modal phrases in the past). Listening to opinions.
Expressing opinion in speech and writing. Past modal verbs.

Week 13  
Modals in the past practice. Listening: difficult decisions (p 118).
Listening to and retelling a story. Hypothetical situations in the past.

Week 14
Revision of hypothetical situations in the past; mixed conditionals.

Test 2

Week 15 - Week 16
Presentations; homereading
